name: Tafsir
title: Tafsir refers to the explanation or interpretation of the Quran. It is a scholarly effort to understand the meanings, context, and implications of the Quranic verses in light of Islamic teachings.

name: Tajweed
title: Tajweed refers to the set of rules governing the proper pronunciation, articulation, and recitation of the Quran.

name: Hifz
title: Hifz is the process of memorizing the entire Quran, an act of devotion and a highly honored practice in Islam.

name: Hadith Studies
title: Hadith refers to the sayings, actions, and approvals of the Prophet Muhammad (peace be upon him).

name: Aqeedah
title: Aqeedah refers to the fundamental beliefs and creed of a Muslim, forming the foundation of their faith (Iman). It encompasses belief in the six articles of faith and the principles of Tawheed (monotheism).
